title: A new plant-esterase inhibition based electrochemical sensor with signal amplification by MoS2@N-CDs for chlorpyrifos detection
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,10703-10713
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00009A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Jiayu Chen, Chun Ji, Xiao Wang, Yunxia Tian, Han Tao
A new enzyme-inhibited electrochemical biosensor was developed for the low-cost and highly sensitive detection of CPF using MoS2@N-CDs as the electrocatalyst and KdBE as the biorecognition element of CPF.
